import "./booking.css"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/Navbar"; import Header from "../../components/header/Header"; import MailList from "../../components/mailList/MailList"; import Footer from "../../components/footer/Footer"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import API from "../../constants/api"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; const Booking = () => { const [item, setItem] = useState({}); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: "selection", }, ]); const params = useParams(); const hotelId = params.hotelId; useEffect(() => { const searchBody = { hotelId, startDate: date[0].startDate, endDate: date[0].endDate, }; fetch(API.POST_FREE_ROOMS_SEARCH, { method: "POST", credentials: "include", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(searchBody), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => console.log(data)); }, [date, hotelId]); return (

This is hotel title

This is hotel description

From ${item.cheapestPrice} (1 night)

Dates

setDate([item.selection])} minDate={new Date()} ranges={date} />

Reserve info

Select Rooms

Room name
Max people: 4
Price: $140
101
102
202

Total Bill: $700

); }; export default Booking;
